## Goal
Build a reusable Bounty Card component.

## Requirements
- Title
- Reward amount
- Tags
- Difficulty badge
- Progress bar
- Responsive layout
- Tailwind styling with hover effects

## Acceptance Criteria
- Component is reusable with props
- Looks good on mobile and desktop
- No console errors

## Demo
- Include screenshots (desktop + mobile)
